thought: The current inventory contains a gold_block at slot 21. To craft a golden_sword, we need to first obtain a gold_ingot and a stick. Since the gold_block can be smelted into gold_ingots, I will first move the gold_block from slot 21 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1
